message: Welcome to our store! We're proud to offer a high-quality product at a fixed price of $100. With a value of $400 to you if it's indeed high-quality, this is an excellent opportunity to acquire a premium item at a fair price. Don't miss out on this chance to own something exceptional.
I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I understand the product is worth $0 to me if it's low quality, right? I'm hoping it's high quality, of course!

Hello there! Our current product offering is guaranteed to be of high quality, ensuring you receive the best value for your $100. Given the potential return of $400 if it meets your expectations, this is a great investment in quality. Trust us to deliver excellence!
